DOC.brief_summary: Do TNF-308 and -238 polymorphisms impact the embryo implantation rate after in vitro fertilization (IVF) in women without female infertility factor ?
DOC.detailed_description: This study was performed in order to verify whether TNF-308 allele was associated with a higher implantation rate and multiple pregnancy rates in women without known infertility factors after ovarian hyperstimulation with exogenous FSH for IVF
DOC.criteria: Women normal karyotype, age under 38 years serum folliclestimulating hormone (Day3 FSH) levels below 10 UI/l age under 18 years
